item.title: Automatic Static Site creation with Astro, Supabase and Netlify
item.description: Introduction This week, I revealed mixes.it - a very simple site I’ve created for indexing DJ mixes scraped from the web. I wanted a no-frills site that I could get Spotify playlists of DJ’s I like to see what new music they were playing and that I didn’t have to spend much time supporting. I used Astro and Supabase to create the site itself and the whole thing is currently built using Netlify.
